strapiPost.title: The Countdown Continues
strapiPost.content:
The Walmart NW Arkansas Championship presented by P&G returns Sep. 20-26 for the 15th anniversary of the tournament.

  • Perfect blend: The week long schedule of events will feature BITE Experience @ the LPGA, a 3 day culinary experience, 5k @ the LPGA, and a variety of volunteer opportunities.
  • A la carte: In celebration of the 15th anniversary, weekly tickets, regularly priced at $25, will be offered for $15, or daily tickets for $10, and all kids aged 17 and under will get in free with a ticketed adult. Maybe running is your thing - you can register for the 5k @ the LPGA here.

Tickets are on sale now for the #NWAChampionship and other events, which you can find HERE.
